delete.desc: Deletes an existing Azure Cosmos DB SQL container.

202.desc: The SQL container delete operation will complete asynchronously.

204.desc: The SQL container delete operation was completed successfully.

get.desc: Lists the SQL databases under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

200.desc: The SQL database properties were retrieved successfully.

delete.desc: Deletes an existing Azure Cosmos DB SQL storedProcedure.

202.desc: The SQL storedProcedure delete operation will complete asynchronously.

204.desc: The SQL storedProcedure delete operation was completed successfully.

get.desc: Lists the SQL container under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

200.desc: The SQL container properties were retrieved successfully.

delete.desc: Deletes an existing Azure Cosmos DB SQL database.

202.desc: The SQL database delete operation will complete asynchronously.

204.desc: The SQL database delete operation was completed successfully.

get.desc: Lists the SQL storedProcedure under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

200.desc: The SQL stored procedure properties were retrieved successfully.
